item.title: Customers of AIA Singapore receive complimentary coverage for Covid-19
item.description: AIA Singapore is offering complimentary COVID-19 coverage to eligible customers. This additional coverage is automatic and requires no action from the customer. The company stated that this initiative underscores their commitment to supporting the health and well-being of their customers, particularly during challenging times. Customers eligible for this benefit will receive it automatically. The coverage will remain active until December 31, 2020, or 30 days after the DORSCON level returns to green, whichever comes first.
